contextId.information: You can translate this ordinal term "third" as "time number 3." (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])
The pronoun "he" refers to Jesus. Here "a third time" means "time number 3." AT: "Jesus said to him a third time" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]])
contextId.quote: He said to him a third time
